description: It is expected to be several weeks before Guernsey is able to carry out its own tests.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey schools to close due to UK testing delays
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey schools to close due to UK testing delays - BBC News
maintext: "The travel restrictions which have come into effect today, where people who arrive in the Bailiwick by law have to self-isolate for 14 days, and the guidance on social distancing and other ways of reducing contact mean there is a reasonable chance that the Bailiwick will be able to remain in the 'containment' phase and schools can resume as soon as possible after the scheduled Easter break.
